head.title: Trashed Parking Spaces
head.description: These are (community) parking spaces that have been deleted and placed in the trash. You can manage, restore, or permanently delete them here.

delete.title: Move to Trash?
delete.description: Are you sure you want to move the parking space at "{{street}}, {{city}}" to the trash?

restore.title: Restore Location?
restore.description: Are you sure you want to restore the parking space at "{{street}}, {{city}}"?

forceDelete.title: Permanently Delete?
forceDelete.description: Are you sure you want to permanently delete the parking space at "{{street}}, {{city}}"? This action cannot be undone.

bulkRestore.title: Restore Selected Locations?
bulkRestore.description: Are you sure you want to restore {{count}} parking spaces?

bulkForceDelete.title: Permanently Delete Selected?
bulkForceDelete.description: Are you sure you want to permanently delete {{count}} parking spaces? This cannot be undone.

delete.error: Failed to move parking space to trash

forceDelete.error: Failed to permanently delete parking space
